2026 Recruiting Cycle

Investment Banking Recruiting 2026

Complete timeline for the 2026 summer analyst recruiting cycle. Application windows, interview dates, and what's changed this year.

Get Networking TemplatesView Full Timeline

2026 SA recruiting is actively underway. Applications at top banks close fast—don't wait.

2026 Recruiting Timeline

For students graduating in May 2027, recruiting for summer 2026 internships.

Early Networking Window

January - February 2025
  • Start reaching out to analysts and associates
  • Attend virtual info sessions
  • Build your target list of banks and groups
  • Begin technical preparation

Application Flood

March - April 2025
  • Bulge bracket applications open
  • Elite boutiques begin recruiting
  • First round interviews start at some firms
  • Resume drops and coffee chats peak
Active Now
3

Interview Season

May - June 2025
  • Superdays at major banks
  • Final round interviews
  • Offers extended (often exploding)
  • Middle market banks still recruiting
4

Late Cycle

July - August 2025
  • Remaining spots filled
  • Some banks do second rounds
  • Off-cycle opportunities emerge
  • Diversity programs recruit
5

Internship Execution

Summer 2026
  • 10-week SA programs
  • Conversion to full-time offers
  • Network for PE/HF recruiting
  • Build deal experience

2026 Dates by Bank

Approximate windows based on historical patterns. Check firm career pages for exact dates.

BankApps OpenInterviewsNotes
Goldman SachsJan-Feb 2025Mar-May 2025Historically earliest mover
Morgan StanleyFeb-Mar 2025Apr-Jun 2025Strong diversity recruiting
JP MorganFeb-Mar 2025Apr-Jun 2025Large class sizes
Bank of AmericaMar-Apr 2025May-Jul 2025Multiple interview rounds
CitiMar-Apr 2025May-Jul 2025Video interviews common
EvercoreMar-Apr 2025Apr-Jun 2025Small classes, selective
LazardMar-May 2025May-Jul 2025Restructuring focus
CenterviewApr-May 2025May-Jul 2025Very small, elite
PJT PartnersApr-May 2025Jun-Jul 2025Rx and M&A tracks
MoelisApr-Jun 2025Jun-Aug 2025Later cycle typically

*Dates are estimates based on prior cycles. Always verify with official sources.

What's Changed for 2026

Key shifts in the 2026 recruiting cycle you need to know.

Earlier Start

Recruiting continues to accelerate. Banks are opening applications 1-2 weeks earlier than 2025.

AI Screening

More banks using HireVue and AI-powered resume screening. Keywords matter more than ever.

Virtual Components

First rounds often virtual. Superdays typically in-person but some hybrid options remain.

Exploding Offers

24-72 hour deadlines are standard. Be prepared to decide fast.

Diversity Focus

Expanded diversity programs with earlier timelines. SEO, MLT, and firm-specific programs.

The timeline is compressed. Start preparing now.
